author: cnbc.com
title: ATSG Appoints Key Sales & Marketing Executives Following Strong Demand for Technology Solutions as a Service
text:
MANHATTAN, N.Y., Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- ATSG , a tech-enabled managed services and solutions company, today announced the appointment of two new executives: Elizabeth Kubycheck, Chief Marketing Officer and Tony Ferrigno, Senior Vice President, Sales and Solutions. The hires come following the strong demand for their Technology Solutions as a Service offerings and to support the company's mission and leadership position in the managed services industry.
On making the announcement, Anthony J. D'Ambrosi, President of ATSG said, "We continue to see rapid change and opportunity in the market. Investing in these seasoned professionals, with deep expertise in the entire client engagement lifecycle, brings us significant momentum toward accelerating our growth strategy."
Elizabeth Kubycheck, as Chief Marketing Officer, is responsible for providing executive leadership and management for ATSG's marketing strategy and communications initiatives. Mrs. Kubycheck joins ATSG with 20 years of international and domestic marketing, communications and sales support leadership in both public and private institutions.
Tony Ferrigno, as Senior Vice President, Sales and Solutions is responsible for leading ATSG's efforts to rapidly expand its position across both existing clients and new logo's alike. Mr. Ferrigno is a veteran sales, operations and technology executive with over 30 years of experience in information technology outsourcing.
Mrs. Kubycheck and Mr. Ferrigno will be collaborating to broadly drive the Technology Solutions as a Service value proposition across the marketplace.
About ATSG
ATSG is a tech-enabled managed services and solutions company focused on innovative solutions to enhance the end-user experience. ATSG provides technology solutions as a service to a variety of customers; leveraging their portfolio of rediCloud, rediTech, and rediManage, which includes deep expertise in technology consulting, wireless and network, unified communications, collaboration, Multicloud solutions, data center, mobility and productivity solutions.
ATSG is headquartered in Briarcliff Manor, New York with additional locations in the Tristate area. For more information on ATSG, please visit us on the web at www.atsg.net , like us on LinkedIn , Twitter or become a fan on our Facebook page.
